amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, reduces funding for the Office of the Secretary by $420,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease the Office of the Secretary by $420,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A022) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 213 (Roll no. 657).

action.text: Scalise amendment (A022) modified by unanimous consent. The modification proposes to strike the second instruction of the amendment.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A022) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 213 (Roll no. 657).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Scalise.
